Name: RSI Apollo Medivac
Description:
Manufacturer: RSI
Focus: Medical

Along with superior armor and dual missile racks, the 2948 Apollo Medivac model pays homage to the classic 2910 film, Astromedics: Back from the Brink, with livery that accurately recreates the headlining Kithara.
